attributes.action: compensate every one of the 25 million people who's privacy has been breached.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If we cant trust the government to ensure our personal and private details to be kept safe, we can trust noone, any one of us whos details have been breeched could face fraudulent activity on our bank accounts or credit files and cause months of aggrovasion to prove it has nothing to do with us.
Every single person who's details have been violated by this loss should be given compensation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
